==Walkthrough==
# Go east.
# Defeat the enemy in the hallway to the north: {{Enemy|Nobushi: Kikouban|x=1}}
# Go north into Room 1.
# Defeat the opponents blocking the path and proceed onward (0/6).
#* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Nobushi: Jintouban;Nobushi: Kikouban*2}}
#* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Nobushi: Jintouban;Nobushi: Hitsukeban*2}}
#* There is a '''Common Chest''' near the western wall of Room 1.
# Defeat the enemy in the hallway to the north: {{Enemy|Nobushi: Kikouban|x=1}}
#* There is an '''Exquisite Chest''' in the hallway.
# Go north into Room 2.
# Defeat the opponents blocking the path and proceed onward (0/12).
#* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Nobushi: Hitsukeban;Nobushi: Jintouban;Nobushi: Kikouban}}
#* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Nobushi: Hitsukeban;Nobushi: Jintouban;Nobushi: Kikouban}}
#* Wave 3: {{Enemy List|Nobushi: Hitsukeban;Nobushi: Jintouban;Nobushi: Kikouban}}
#* Wave 4: {{Enemy List|Nobushi: Hitsukeban;Nobushi: Jintouban;Nobushi: Kikouban}}
#* There is a '''Common Chest''' near the western wall of Room 2.
# Defeat the enemy in the hallway to the north: {{Enemy|Nobushi: Kikouban|x=1}}. Electro floor panels will be activated.
# Go north into Room 3.
# Defeat the opponents blocking the path and proceed onward (0/2).
#* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Kairagi: Dancing Thunder;Kairagi: Fiery Might}}
#* There is an '''Exquisite Chest''' in the northeastern side of Room 3.
# Go north and take the elevator up.
#* There is a '''Common Chest''' in the western corner just before the entrance to Room 4.
# Go north into Room 4 and start a cut scene.
#* There is a '''Precious Chest''' before the exit.
